Description: Limestone stela of Prince Ahmose shown seated with his pet dog in receipt of offerings from his son(?); above are three lines of Hieroglyphic text including an invocation to Ptah-Sokar-Osiris.
Curator's comments: Published: J. Bourriau, JEA 73 (1987), p. 193, pl. XI, 3 C. Vandersleyen, Iahmes Sapair, Bruxelles 2005, pp. 22, 24 and 72 (doc. 17)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2016 8 Mar-12 Jun, Cleveland, Cleveland Museum of Art, Pharoah: King of Egypt 2018 7 Jun-16 Sep, Barcelona, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2018-2019 16 Oct-20 jan, Madrid, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt
